ing: 1/4 cup orange flavored liqueur, or to taste
des: "A quick and elegant strawberry dessert made with fresh strawberries and an irresistible cream sauce. It looks as good as it tastes!"
ins: In a medium bowl, stir together the sour cream, vanilla ice cream, and whipped cream. Gradually stir in the orange liqueur. Divide the berries between two parfait glasses, and spoon the cream mixture over them. Garnish with mint leaves and shaved chocolate.
